meanings.definition: Give a spoken or written account of something observed, heard, done, or investigated.
meanings.sent1: I will report back to you after I finish my investigation.
meanings.sent2: She will report the news to the class tomorrow.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to report the case in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm seemed to report the anger of the sky.
meanings.sent5: The witness's report was so detailed, it felt like I was there.

meanings.definition: An account given of a particular matter, especially in the form of an official document, after thorough investigation or consideration.
meanings.sent1: The annual report showed an increase in sales this year.
meanings.sent2: Please hand in your report by the end of the day.
meanings.sent3: The cat's report on the missing toy was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The report of the meeting echoed through the office.
meanings.sent5: The report from the scientist was filled with fascinating discoveries.
